# URL.ParseStrategy.ComponentParseStrategy.required

**Case**

A strategy that requires the presence of the associated component for parsing to succeed.

## Declaration

```swift
case required
```

## Component parse strategies

- **URL.ParseStrategy.ComponentParseStrategy.optional**: A strategy that treats the presence of the associated component as optional.
- **URL.ParseStrategy.ComponentParseStrategy.defaultValue(_:)**: A strategy that provides a default value for a component if it’s absent in the source string.

items.description: A strategy that treats the presence of the associated component as optional.
items.name: URL.ParseStrategy.ComponentParseStrategy.optional

items.description: A strategy that provides a default value for a component if it’s absent in the source string.
